leaf_cluster.leaf_cluster_name: 生信-宏基因组与微生物生态
leaf_cluster.task_chain: 组装→分箱→分类→功能注释→统计→benchmark

unit.unit_name: 群落统计/生态分析/可视化

tools.name: ProtRank
tools.one_line_profile: Python package for differential abundance analysis of proteomics data
tools.detailed_description: A Python package designed for performing differential abundance analysis specifically on proteomics datasets, facilitating statistical inference in protein expression studies.

tools.name: Phylogenetic-Analysis-Pipeline
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for protein sequence alignment and phylogenetic analysis
tools.detailed_description: A Python-based pipeline that integrates Biopython and Clustal Omega to perform protein sequence alignment, distance matrix calculation, and phylogenetic tree construction (UPGMA & NJ) with visualization capabilities.

tools.name: fluflo
tools.one_line_profile: Nextflow pipeline for generating phylogenetic trees for Auspice visualization
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow bioinformatics pipeline designed to generate phylogenetic trees from influenza sequence data, formatted for visualization in the Auspice platform.

tools.name: RCM
tools.one_line_profile: Model-based visualization method for microbiome data
tools.detailed_description: An R package that implements a model-based visualization method for microbiome data, helping to reveal patterns in community composition through advanced ordination techniques.

tools.name: file2meco
tools.one_line_profile: Data conversion tool for the microeco R package
tools.detailed_description: An R package designed to transform various external file formats into the microtable object structure required by the microeco package, facilitating data import and preprocessing.

tools.name: mecodev
tools.one_line_profile: Extended analysis classes for the microeco package
tools.detailed_description: A development package providing extended classes and functions based on the microeco package, offering advanced or experimental features for microbial community ecology analysis.

tools.name: meconetcomp
tools.one_line_profile: Microbial co-occurrence network comparison tool
tools.detailed_description: An R package for comparing microbial co-occurrence networks, built upon the trans_network class of the microeco package, enabling comparative network analysis in microbial ecology.

tools.name: microeco
tools.one_line_profile: Comprehensive R package for microbial community ecology analysis
tools.detailed_description: A robust R package for data mining and analysis in microbial community ecology, covering diversity analysis, taxonomy, differential abundance, network analysis, and functional prediction.

tools.name: reltools
tools.one_line_profile: Microbiome amplicon analysis and visualization utilities
tools.detailed_description: An R package providing helper functions for the analysis and visualization of microbiome amplicon sequencing data, streamlining common workflows in microbial ecology.

tools.name: ANCOMBC
tools.one_line_profile: Differential abundance analysis for microbial absolute abundance data
tools.detailed_description: An R package for performing differential abundance (DA) and correlation analyses on microbial absolute abundance data, incorporating bias correction methods.

tools.name: mgnet
tools.one_line_profile: Tidy workflows for metagenomic network analysis
tools.detailed_description: An R package providing data structures and tidy workflows specifically designed for metagenomic network analysis, facilitating the construction and exploration of microbial networks.

tools.name: OTUsamples2krona
tools.one_line_profile: Script to generate Krona charts from OTU tables
tools.detailed_description: A shell script that automates the generation of interactive Krona visualization charts for all samples contained within an OTU table file.

tools.name: mbtools
tools.one_line_profile: Helper functions for microbiome analysis workflows
tools.detailed_description: An R package providing a suite of helper functions for common microbiome analysis workflows, ranging from data preprocessing to visualization.

tools.name: VFtree
tools.one_line_profile: Visualization of Virulence Factors and phylogenetic trees
tools.detailed_description: An R package designed to enhance the visualization of Virulence Factors alongside phylogenetic trees, specifically for bacterial pan-genome analysis.

tools.name: microshades
tools.one_line_profile: Color blind accessible palettes for microbiome visualization
tools.detailed_description: An R package that provides custom, color-blind accessible color palettes and functions specifically tailored for improving the visualization of microbiome data.

tools.name: ampvis2
tools.one_line_profile: Tools for visualising microbial community amplicon data
tools.detailed_description: An R package for the visualization and analysis of microbial community data obtained from amplicon sequencing, offering functions for heatmaps, ordination, and composition plots.

tools.name: biome-shiny
tools.one_line_profile: GUI for microbiome visualization based on the microbiome package
tools.detailed_description: A Shiny-based Graphical User Interface (GUI) that facilitates microbiome data visualization and analysis, leveraging the capabilities of the 'microbiome' R package.

tools.name: ampvis
tools.one_line_profile: Legacy tool for visualising microbial community amplicon data
tools.detailed_description: The predecessor to ampvis2, providing tools for visualizing microbial community amplicon data. (Note: Deprecated in favor of ampvis2).

tools.name: MetaKraken2
tools.one_line_profile: Metagenomic pipeline for Kraken2 analysis and Krona reporting
tools.detailed_description: A shell-based metagenomic pipeline that automates taxonomic classification using Kraken2 and generates interactive visualization reports using Krona.

tools.name: AMRplusplus
tools.one_line_profile: Bioinformatic pipeline for antimicrobial resistance gene profiling
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow-based bioinformatic pipeline designed to analyze raw sequencing reads and characterize the resistome (antimicrobial resistance gene profile) of microbial samples.

tools.name: dar
tools.one_line_profile: Consensus-based differential abundance analysis tool
tools.detailed_description: An R tool that runs multiple differential abundance analysis methods and employs a consensus strategy to identify robustly differentially abundant features in microbiome data.

tools.name: OceanOmics-amplicon-nf
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for amplicon data analysis from reads to phyloseq objects
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow pipeline developed to process amplicon sequencing data, taking raw reads and generating ecologically informative phyloseq objects for downstream analysis.

tools.name: SPHARM-PDM
tools.one_line_profile: Shape analysis tool using parametric boundary descriptions
tools.detailed_description: A C++ tool for computing point-based models using parametric boundary descriptions (SPHARM-PDM) to perform precise shape analysis, often used in medical imaging to locate morphological changes.

tools.name: pb-metagenomics-tools
tools.one_line_profile: Tools and pipelines for PacBio HiFi metagenomics
tools.detailed_description: A collection of tools and pipelines specifically tailored for processing and analyzing PacBio HiFi reads in metagenomic studies, including assembly and taxonomic profiling.

tools.name: Phinch
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive visualization framework for biological datasets
tools.detailed_description: A data visualization framework designed to facilitate the exploration of large biological datasets, such as microbiomes and metagenomes, supporting BIOM files and offline use.

tools.name: MicroEcoTools
tools.one_line_profile: Theoretical microbial ecology computational tools
tools.detailed_description: A collection of R functions and tools designed for theoretical microbial ecology analysis and computational modeling.

tools.name: DoubleRecViz
tools.one_line_profile: Visualization tool for double reconciliations in phylogenetics
tools.detailed_description: A tool for visualizing and editing double reconciliations between phylogenetic trees at three levels: transcript, gene, and species.

tools.name: mbDenoise
tools.one_line_profile: Microbiome data denoising using zero-inflated probabilistic PCA
tools.detailed_description: An accurate and robust method for denoising microbiome data using a zero-inflated probabilistic PCA (ZIPPCA) model to address zero-inflation and technical noise.

tools.name: ggtree
tools.one_line_profile: Visualization and annotation of phylogenetic trees
tools.detailed_description: An R package for visualizing and annotating phylogenetic trees with their covariates and other associated data.

tools.name: mothur_krona
tools.one_line_profile: Converter for Mothur taxonomy files to Krona XML
tools.detailed_description: A Python script to convert taxonomy summary files generated by Mothur into Krona XML format for interactive visualization.

tools.name: TreeLink
tools.one_line_profile: Phylogenetic tree integration, clustering, and visualization
tools.detailed_description: A tool for data integration, clustering, and visualization of phylogenetic trees, likely for comparative analysis.

tools.name: HMSC
tools.one_line_profile: Hierarchical Model of Species Communities
tools.detailed_description: An R package for Hierarchical Model of Species Communities (HMSC), providing tools for numerical analysis of ecological communities using hierarchical regression and latent factor models.

tools.name: Maaslin2
tools.one_line_profile: Microbiome Multivariate Association with Linear Models
tools.detailed_description: Comprehensive statistical framework for determining multivariable association between clinical metadata and microbial meta-omics features.

tools.name: emperor
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive visualization of large microbial ecology datasets
tools.detailed_description: A tool for the analysis and visualization of large microbial ecology datasets, typically used for PCoA plots in QIIME 2.

tools.name: empress
tools.one_line_profile: Fast and scalable phylogenetic tree viewer
tools.detailed_description: A fast and scalable phylogenetic tree viewer for microbiome data analysis, enabling integration of tree visualization with feature metadata.

tools.name: qurro
tools.one_line_profile: Visualization of differentially ranked features and log-ratios
tools.detailed_description: A tool to visualize differentially ranked features (taxa, metabolites) and their log-ratios across samples, aiding in compositional data analysis.

tools.name: songbird
tools.one_line_profile: Compositional regression for microbiome differential abundance
tools.detailed_description: Vanilla regression methods for microbiome differential abundance analysis, designed to handle compositional data constraints.

tools.name: microbiome_procedures
tools.one_line_profile: Mothur procedures for 16S and ITS analysis
tools.detailed_description: A collection of procedures and scripts for processing 16S and ITS amplicon sequencing data using Mothur.

tools.name: biomehorizon
tools.one_line_profile: Parallel plotting of microbiome time series
tools.detailed_description: An R package designed to plot microbiome time series data in parallel, facilitating longitudinal analysis visualization.

tools.name: MicrobiomeStat
tools.one_line_profile: Longitudinal microbiome analysis and visualization
tools.detailed_description: A package to track, analyze, and visualize microbiome temporal patterns, specifically designed for longitudinal study designs.

tools.name: ggpicrust2
tools.one_line_profile: Visualization and analysis of PICRUSt2 output
tools.detailed_description: An R package to simplify the analysis and visualization of functional prediction results from PICRUSt2.

tools.name: GenomicsFreedom
tools.one_line_profile: Web application for genomic exploration and analysis
tools.detailed_description: A Flask-based app for genomic exploration including base/GC stats, alignment visualization, distance matrices, and phylogenetic tree building.

tools.name: rbiom
tools.one_line_profile: Integrated analysis and visualization of microbiome data
tools.detailed_description: An R package designed for the integrated analysis and visualization of microbiome data, handling BIOM formats and providing statistical tools.

tools.name: archaeopteryx-js
tools.one_line_profile: Visualization of highly annotated phylogenetic trees
tools.detailed_description: A JavaScript software tool for the visualization and analysis of highly annotated phylogenetic trees.

tools.name: psadd
tools.one_line_profile: Additions to the phyloseq package
tools.detailed_description: An R package providing additional functions and extensions for the phyloseq package for microbiome analysis.

tools.name: GMWI-webtool
tools.one_line_profile: Gut Microbiome Wellness Index assessment tool
tools.detailed_description: A browser application for assessing health through metagenomic gut microbiome profiling using the Gut Microbiome Wellness Index (GMWI).

tools.name: microViz
tools.one_line_profile: Microbiome data visualization and statistics
tools.detailed_description: An R package for microbiome data visualization and statistics, extending phyloseq and vegan with tidyverse integration.

tools.name: Co-VeGAN
tools.one_line_profile: Complex-Valued GAN for MRI Reconstruction
tools.detailed_description: A Complex-Valued Generative Adversarial Network (GAN) for Compressive Sensing MR Image Reconstruction.

tools.name: pavian
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive analysis of metagenomics data
tools.detailed_description: An R package and Shiny application for the interactive analysis and visualization of metagenomics classification results (e.g., Kraken, Centrifuge).

tools.name: metabaRpipe
tools.one_line_profile: Metabarcoding data processing pipeline
tools.detailed_description: An R package to process raw metabarcoding data into a phyloseq object using a single command, streamlining the analysis workflow.

tools.name: metaphlan-plot-by-taxa
tools.one_line_profile: Plotting script for MetaPhlAn profiles
tools.detailed_description: A Python script to convert metagenomic profile text files (e.g., from MetaPhlAn) into taxa level plots using Bokeh and Phyloseq.

tools.name: q2-matchmaker
tools.one_line_profile: QIIME 2 plugin for case-control differential abundance
tools.detailed_description: A QIIME 2 plugin for performing differential abundance analysis specifically designed for matched case-control studies.

tools.name: FuncDiv
tools.one_line_profile: R package for computing alpha and beta contributional diversity metrics
tools.detailed_description: FuncDiv is an R package designed to compute contributional diversity metrics, specifically focusing on alpha and beta diversity contributions within ecological communities.

tools.name: ggvegan
tools.one_line_profile: ggplot2-based visualization tools for the vegan package
tools.detailed_description: ggvegan provides a set of functions to create ggplot2-based plots for results generated by the vegan package, facilitating the visualization of ordination and other ecological analyses.

tools.name: qiime_to_lefse
tools.one_line_profile: Converter for QIIME taxa tables to LEfSe format
tools.detailed_description: A utility script to convert QIIME generated taxa tables and mapping files into a format compatible with LEfSe for biomarker discovery.

tools.name: biom2lefse
tools.one_line_profile: Converter for BIOM files to LEfSe format
tools.detailed_description: A tool to convert BIOM (Biological Observation Matrix) files into a format compatible with LEfSe (Linear discriminant analysis Effect Size) for downstream analysis.

tools.name: q2-aldex2
tools.one_line_profile: QIIME 2 plugin for ALDEx2 differential abundance analysis
tools.detailed_description: A QIIME 2 plugin that wraps the ALDEx2 R package, enabling differential abundance analysis of compositional data within the QIIME 2 ecosystem.

tools.name: evident
tools.one_line_profile: Effect size and power calculations for microbiome data
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for performing effect size calculations and power analysis specifically tailored for microbiome data and other high-dimensional biological datasets.

tools.name: fantaxtic
tools.one_line_profile: Nested bar plots for Phyloseq data visualization
tools.detailed_description: An R package that generates nested bar plots to visualize the abundance of taxa at multiple taxonomic levels simultaneously, designed to work with phyloseq objects.

tools.name: microbial
tools.one_line_profile: Wrapper for microbiome analysis using DADA2 and Phyloseq
tools.detailed_description: An R package that streamlines microbiome analysis workflows by integrating DADA2 for sequence inference and Phyloseq for downstream analysis and visualization.

tools.name: Dendroscope3
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive viewer for phylogenetic trees and networks
tools.detailed_description: A program for working with rooted phylogenetic trees and networks, providing capabilities for visualization, analysis, and comparison of phylogenetic structures.

tools.name: plottree
tools.one_line_profile: Command line tool for phylogenetic tree visualization
tools.detailed_description: A lightweight Python command-line tool designed to quickly visualize phylogenetic trees directly from the terminal.

tools.name: EMRALD
tools.one_line_profile: Event Modeling Risk Assessment using Linked Diagrams
tools.detailed_description: A software tool for dynamic Probabilistic Risk Assessment (PRA) that simplifies modeling through state diagrams and supports coupling with physics-based simulations.

tools.name: microfiltR
tools.one_line_profile: Accessory functions for microbial community data processing
tools.detailed_description: An R package providing helper functions for filtering and processing microbial community data, likely designed to work alongside standard tools like phyloseq.

tools.name: phyloseq
tools.one_line_profile: Handling and analysis of high-throughput microbiome census data
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive R package for the import, storage, analysis, and graphical display of complex phylogenetic sequencing data, including OTU tables, taxonomy, and metadata.

tools.name: shiny-phyloseq
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive web application for Phyloseq
tools.detailed_description: A Shiny-based interactive web application that provides a graphical user interface for the phyloseq R package, enabling users to explore and visualize microbiome data without coding.

tools.name: compositional
tools.one_line_profile: Python package for compositional data analysis
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for analyzing compositional data, offering methods for CLR/ILR transformations, proportionality analysis, and partial correlation, which are essential for microbiome datasets.

tools.name: gracken
tools.one_line_profile: Phylogenetic tree generation from Bracken/Kraken2 reports
tools.detailed_description: A tool to generate phylogenetic trees directly from the output reports of Kraken2 and Bracken taxonomic classifiers, facilitating downstream phylogenetic analysis.

tools.name: q2-krona
tools.one_line_profile: QIIME 2 plugin for Krona visualization
tools.detailed_description: A QIIME 2 plugin that enables the generation of Krona charts, which are hierarchical visualizations of taxonomic abundance, directly from QIIME 2 artifacts.

tools.name: genome-bin-tools
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive tools for metagenome visualization and binning
tools.detailed_description: A set of R functions and interactive tools for visualizing metagenomic contigs and refining genome bins (MAGs) based on coverage and composition.

tools.name: MFC-TopoReg
tools.one_line_profile: Topological Data Analysis for dynamic network community structures
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of a method for learning persistent community structures in dynamic networks using Topological Data Analysis (TDA), applicable to complex systems analysis.

tools.name: abdiv
tools.one_line_profile: Alpha and beta diversity measures for community ecology
tools.detailed_description: An R package providing implementations of various alpha and beta diversity indices used in community ecology and microbiome analysis.

tools.name: microbiomeViz
tools.one_line_profile: Microbiome data visualization using ggtree
tools.detailed_description: An R package that leverages ggtree to create complex visualizations for microbiome data, such as cladograms annotated with abundance or differential analysis results.

tools.name: krakenSankey
tools.one_line_profile: Sankey diagrams for Kraken reports
tools.detailed_description: An R tool to generate Sankey diagrams from Kraken taxonomic classification reports, useful for visualizing the flow of taxonomic assignments.

tools.name: MSEABOARD
tools.one_line_profile: Dashboard for MSA and phylogenetic visualization
tools.detailed_description: A web-based dashboard for the interactive visualization and analysis of multiple sequence alignments (MSA), phylogenetic trees, and protein structures.

tools.name: wiSDOM
tools.one_line_profile: GUI for metagenomic data analysis and visualization
tools.detailed_description: A browser-based R Shiny interface designed to allow scientists without programming expertise to conduct statistical analysis and visualization of metagenomic data.

tools.name: phyloseq-extended
tools.one_line_profile: Extended functions for Phyloseq analysis
tools.detailed_description: A collection of custom R functions that extend the capabilities of the phyloseq package, used in training courses for 16S metagenomics analysis.

tools.name: Krona
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive visualization tool for metagenomic classification data
tools.detailed_description: Krona allows hierarchical data to be explored with zooming, multi-layered pie charts. It is widely used in metagenomics to visualize taxonomic composition.

tools.name: ComplexityByStartPosition
tools.one_line_profile: Tool to measure RNA-Seq library complexity via start position rarefaction
tools.detailed_description: Creates a rarefaction curve to measure complexity in RNA Seq data using start positions, helping to assess library quality and diversity.

tools.name: MICOM
tools.one_line_profile: Metabolic modeling of microbial communities
tools.detailed_description: MICOM is a Python package for metabolic modeling of microbial communities, allowing for the simulation of growth rates and fluxes in complex microbiomes.

tools.name: miaViz
tools.one_line_profile: Microbiome Analysis Plotting and Visualization
tools.detailed_description: Part of the mia (Microbiome Analysis) family of R packages, providing functions for visualizing microbiome data, including abundance plots and ordination.

tools.name: microbiome
tools.one_line_profile: R package for microbiome data analysis
tools.detailed_description: Tools for microbiome analysis, extending the phyloseq package with additional analysis and visualization capabilities for community ecology.

tools.name: microbiomeutilities
tools.one_line_profile: Utilities for microbiome analysis extending phyloseq
tools.detailed_description: A wrapper tool using phyloseq and microbiome R packages to simplify common microbiome data exploration, statistical analysis, and visualization tasks.

tools.name: speedyseq
tools.one_line_profile: Optimized functions for phyloseq data analysis
tools.detailed_description: Provides faster implementations of key functions in the phyloseq package, enabling more efficient analysis of large microbiome datasets.

tools.name: Iroki
tools.one_line_profile: Automatic customization and visualization of phylogenetic trees
tools.detailed_description: A web-based tool and command line interface for visualizing and customizing phylogenetic trees using simple text files.

tools.name: phyTreeViz
tools.one_line_profile: Simple phylogenetic tree visualization Python package
tools.detailed_description: A Python package designed for simple and effective visualization of phylogenetic trees, aiding in evolutionary analysis.

tools.name: AXIOME
tools.one_line_profile: Automation tool for microbial ecology pipelines
tools.detailed_description: AXIOME (Automation, Extension, and Integration Of Microbial Ecology) helps manage and automate numerical ecology pipelines, particularly for QIIME-based analyses.

tools.name: nf-core/differentialabundance
tools.one_line_profile: Differential abundance analysis pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow pipeline for performing differential abundance analysis on feature/observation matrices from RNA-seq or other omics platforms.

tools.name: nf-core/hgtseq
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for horizontal gene transfer investigation
tools.detailed_description: A bioinformatics pipeline to investigate horizontal gene transfer (HGT) events from Next-Generation Sequencing (NGS) data.

tools.name: ShipTV
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive phylogenetic tree visualization
tools.detailed_description: Standalone HTML interactive phylogenetic tree visualization tool powered by Phylocanvas and Javascript, designed for easy sharing and exploration.

tools.name: Phylocom
tools.one_line_profile: Analysis of phylogenetic community structure
tools.detailed_description: Software for the analysis of phylogenetic community structure and character evolution, calculating metrics like phylogenetic diversity (PD) and community relatedness.

tools.name: GRIMER
tools.one_line_profile: Microbiome analysis dashboard focusing on contamination
tools.detailed_description: GRIMER performs analysis of microbiome studies and generates a portable, interactive dashboard integrating annotation, taxonomy, and metadata, with a specific focus on contamination detection.

tools.name: BinaRena
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive visualization and binning of metagenomic contigs
tools.detailed_description: A web-based tool for the interactive visualization and manual refinement of metagenomic bins (MAGs), supporting integration of various binning signals.

tools.name: Dadaist2
tools.one_line_profile: Wrapper pipeline for DADA2 microbiome analysis
tools.detailed_description: A command-line wrapper for DADA2, facilitating the processing of amplicon sequencing data from raw reads to feature tables and taxonomy.

tools.name: miniona
tools.one_line_profile: Realtime Krona plots for MinION sequencing
tools.detailed_description: A tool to generate realtime Krona visualization plots during a MinION sequencing run, helping to monitor sequencing progress and taxonomic composition.

tools.name: Dokdo
tools.one_line_profile: Python package for microbiome sequencing analysis with QIIME 2
tools.detailed_description: A helper package for QIIME 2 users, providing additional visualization and analysis functions for microbiome sequencing data.

tools.name: phylosmith
tools.one_line_profile: Functions for analyzing phyloseq data
tools.detailed_description: A collection of functions to facilitate the analysis and visualization of microbiome data stored in phyloseq objects.

tools.name: taxburst
tools.one_line_profile: Sunburst plots for taxonomy visualization
tools.detailed_description: A tool to generate sunburst plots for taxonomic data, designed to update and enhance Krona visualization capabilities.

tools.name: IcyTree
tools.one_line_profile: Browser-based phylogenetic tree visualization
tools.detailed_description: A browser-based utility for phylogenetic tree visualization, supporting various tree formats and annotations.

tools.name: Tjazi
tools.one_line_profile: Microbiome analysis toolkit for R
tools.detailed_description: A microbiome analysis toolkit for R, providing functions for data processing, analysis, and visualization of microbial communities.

tools.name: MicrobeDS
tools.one_line_profile: Large-scale microbiome datasets for phyloseq
tools.detailed_description: A repository and R package containing large-scale microbiome datasets formatted for use with phyloseq, facilitating benchmarking and analysis.

tools.name: koeken
tools.one_line_profile: LEfSe wrapper for Python
tools.detailed_description: A Linear Discriminant Analysis Effect Size (LEfSe) wrapper to facilitate biomarker discovery and effect size estimation.

tools.name: MIMIC
tools.one_line_profile: Modelling and Inference of MICrobiomes
tools.detailed_description: A Python package dedicated to simulate, model, and predict microbial communities interactions (Modelling and Inference of MICrobiomes Project).

tools.name: MicrobiomeR
tools.one_line_profile: R package for microbiome analysis
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive and customizable R package for microbiome analysis and visualization, developed by Vallender Lab.

tools.name: vegan
tools.one_line_profile: Community ecology analysis package
tools.detailed_description: A popular R package for community ecologists providing ordination methods, ecological null models, and diversity analysis.

tools.name: vegan3d
tools.one_line_profile: 3D plotting for vegan
tools.detailed_description: Dynamic and static 3D plotting functions for the vegan package, enabling 3D visualization of ordination results.

tools.name: phyd3
tools.one_line_profile: Phylogenetic tree viewer based on D3.js
tools.detailed_description: A phylogenetic tree viewer library and tool based on D3.js for interactive visualization of evolutionary trees.

tools.name: lefser
tools.one_line_profile: R implementation of LEfSe
tools.detailed_description: R implementation of the Linear Discriminant Analysis Effect Size (LEfSe) method for microbiome biomarker discovery.

tools.name: CoverM
tools.one_line_profile: Metagenomic read alignment statistics
tools.detailed_description: A tool to calculate read alignment statistics (coverage) for metagenomics, focusing on speed and memory usage.

tools.name: microbiomeMarker
tools.one_line_profile: Microbiome biomarker discovery in R
tools.detailed_description: R package for microbiome biomarker discovery, integrating multiple methods like LEfSe and DESeq2 for robust analysis.

tools.name: microbiomeExplorer
tools.one_line_profile: Shiny app for microbiome analysis
tools.detailed_description: An R package and Shiny application to analyze and visualize microbial community sequencing data.
